The video was published on March 3: 2021, on TikTok and has been viewed more than 9 million times.
The video: s caption in Malaysian language claims that Israeli soldiers were shooting a Palestinian Mosque's Minaret during the Adhan (Islamic call to prayer).
The video includes a sticker text that r: Israeli soldiers shooting a Palestinian Mosque's Minaret when Adhan is being broadcast. But the minaret stays sturdy."
Through reverse image search on Yandex a: the video was found to be originally posted on the verified YouTube channel of US filmmaker Michael Moore in 2008, titled "WINTER SOLDIER: U.S. Marines Fire on Mosques Unprovoked."
